trans-unit.source: Contains a collection of design surfaces.
This class cannot be inherited.
This class provides a read-only collection of design surfaces.
Copies the collection members to the specified <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurface"></xref> array beginning at the specified destination index.
The array to copy collection members to.
The destination index to begin copying to.
Gets the total number of design surfaces in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
The total number of elements in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
Returns an enumerator that can iterate through the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref> instance.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref> instance.
Gets the design surface at the specified index.
The index of the design surface to return.
The design surface at the specified index.
The design surface specified by index is not supported.
For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.CopyTo*> method.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
The one-dimensional <xref:System.Array> that is the destination of the values copied from <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
The index in `array` where copying begins.
For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.Count*> property.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
The number of elements contained in the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.IsSynchronized*> property.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.

<xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref> if access to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref> is synchronized (thread safe); otherwise, <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref>.
For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.ICollection.SyncRoot*> property.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.ICollection> interface.
An object that can be used to synchronize access to the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref>.
For a description of this member, see the <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerable.GetEnumerator*> method.
This member is an explicit interface member implementation.
It can be used only when the <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection> instance is cast to an <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> interface.
An <xref:System.Collections.IEnumerator> for the <xref href="System.ComponentModel.Design.DesignSurfaceCollection"></xref> instance.
